content:
Certainly, here are some recommendations for affordable accommodations in the cities mentioned in the itinerary:

1. London:
- YHA London St Pancras
- Clink78 Hostel
- Generator Hostel London
- Safestay London Elephant & Castle
- Palmers Lodge Hillspring at Willesden Green

2. Paris:
- The Loft Boutique Hostel & Hotel
- Le Regent Montmartre by Hiphophostels
- Vintage Paris Gare du Nord by Hiphophostels
- Absolute Paris Boutique Hostel
- St Christopher's Inn Canal

3. Rome:
- Hostella Female Only
- Alessandro Palace Hostel & Bar
- The Yellow
- Hostel Mosaic Central Rome
- Legends

4. Barcelona:
- Centre Esplai Hostel
- Gothic Point Hostel
- Yeah Barcelona Hostel
- Amistat Beach Hostel Barcelona
- Hostel One Ramblas

5. Amsterdam:
- Stayokay Amsterdam Vondelpark
- Flying Pig Uptown Hostel
- The Bulldog Hostel Amsterdam
- Cocomama Boutique Hostel
- Generator Amsterdam

6. Berlin:
- Grand Hostel Berlin Urban
- Pegasus Hostel Berlin
- The Circus Hostel
- MEININGER Hotel Berlin Mitte Humboldthaus
- Amstel House Hostel

7. Vienna:
- MEININGER Hotel Wien Downtown Sissi
- Hostel Ruthensteiner Wien
- Wombats City Hostel Vienna - The Lounge
- a&t Holiday Hostel
- Summer Hostel

8. Athens:
- Athens Backpackers
- City Circus Athens
- Bed Station Athens
- Acropolis View Dream Hostel
- Athens Studios

These hostels and budget hotels provide clean, comfortable and affordable accommodations. Make sure to book ahead to secure your spot and check customer reviews to ensure they meet your standards. I hope this helps you find the perfect accommodation for your European adventure!
